original_text: Their slain also shall be cast out, and their stink shall come up out of their carcases, and the mountains shall be melted with their blood.
korean_text: 그 살륙 당한 자는 내던진 바 되며 그 사체의 악취가 솟아오르고 그 피에 산들이 녹을 것이며

sentences.original_text: Their slain also shall be cast out
sentences.korean_translation: 그들에게 살해당한 자들 또한 내던져질 것이다

sentences.original_text: and their stink shall come up
and the mountains shall be melted
